content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jun 10 (APP):The Federal Government on Tuesday presented a budget of Rs 17.573 trillion for the fiscal year 2025-26. Following is the breakup of resources and expenditures: Tax Revenue (FBR) a Federal Consolidated Fund: 14,131 II. Non-Bank Borrowing (NSSs & Others) a Public Account: 2,874 III. Net External Receipts a Fed. Consolidated Fund: A A 106 VI. Bank Borrowing (T-Bills, PIBs, Sukuk) a Fed. Consolidated Fund: 3,435 V. Privatization Proceeds a Fed. Consolidated Fund: 87 TOTAL EXPENDITURE (A+B) Rs. In Billion: 17,573 Grants and Transfers to Provinces & Others: 1,928
